title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 23 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 23 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: When thou sittest to eat with a ruler, consider diligently what is before thee:
lineList.cn: 你若与官长坐席，要留意在你面前的是谁。

lineList.en: And put a knife to thy throat, if thou be a man given to appetite.
lineList.cn: 你若是贪食的，就当拿刀放在喉咙上。

lineList.en: Be not desirous of his dainties: for they are deceitful meat.
lineList.cn: 不可贪恋他的美食，因为是哄人的食物。

lineList.en: Labour not to be rich: cease from thine own wisdom.
lineList.cn: 不要劳碌求富。休仗自己的聪明。

lineList.en: Wilt thou set thine eyes upon that which is not? for riches certainly make themselves wings; they fly away as an eagle toward heaven.
lineList.cn: 你岂要定睛在虚无的钱财上吗。因钱财必长翅膀，如鹰向天飞去。

lineList.en: Eat thou not the bread of him that hath an evil eye, neither desire thou his dainty meats:
lineList.cn: 不要吃恶眼人的饭。也不要贪他的美味。

lineList.en: For as he thinketh in his heart, so is he: Eat and drink, saith he to thee; but his heart is not with thee.
lineList.cn: 因为他心怎样思量，他为人就是怎样。他虽对你说，请吃，请喝。他的心却与你向背。

lineList.en: The morsel which thou hast eaten shalt thou vomit up, and lose thy sweet words.
lineList.cn: 你所吃的那点食物，必吐出来。你所说的甘美言语，也必落空。

lineList.en: Speak not in the ears of a fool: for he will despise the wisdom of thy words.
lineList.cn: 你不要说话给愚昧人听。因他必藐视你智慧的言语。

lineList.en: Remove not the old landmark; and enter not into the fields of the fatherless:
lineList.cn: 不可挪移古时的地界。也不可侵入孤儿的田地。

lineList.en: For their redeemer is mighty; he shall plead their cause with thee.
lineList.cn: 因为他们的救赎主，大有能力。他必向你为他们辨屈。

lineList.en: Apply thine heart unto instruction, and thine ears to the words of knowledge.
lineList.cn: 你要留心领受训诲。侧耳听从知识的言语。

lineList.en: Withhold not correction from the child: for if thou beatest him with the rod, he shall not die.
lineList.cn: 不可不管教孩童，你用杖打他，他必不至于死。

lineList.en: Thou shalt beat him with the rod, and shalt deliver his soul from hell.
lineList.cn: 你要用杖打他，就可以救他的灵魂免下阴间。

lineList.en: My son, if thine heart be wise, my heart shall rejoice, even mine.
lineList.cn: 我儿你心若存智慧，我的心也甚欢喜。

lineList.en: Yea, my reins shall rejoice, when thy lips speak right things.
lineList.cn: 你的嘴若说正直话，我的心肠也必快乐。

lineList.en: Let not thine heart envy sinners: but be thou in the fear of the LORD all the day long.
lineList.cn: 你心中不要嫉妒罪人。只要终日敬畏耶和华。

lineList.en: For surely there is an end; and thine expectation shall not be cut off.
lineList.cn: 因为至终必有善报。你的指望也不至断绝。

lineList.en: Hear thou, my son, and be wise, and guide thine heart in the way.
lineList.cn: 我儿，你当听，当存智慧，好在正道上引导你的心。

lineList.en: Be not among winebibbers; among riotous eaters of flesh:
lineList.cn: 好饮酒的，好吃肉的，不要与他们来往。

lineList.en: For the drunkard and the glutton shall come to poverty: and drowsiness shall clothe a man with rags.
lineList.cn: 因为好酒贪食的，必至贫穷。好睡觉的，必穿破烂衣服。

lineList.en: Hearken unto thy father that begat thee, and despise not thy mother when she is old.
lineList.cn: 你要听从生你的父亲。你母亲老了，也不可藐视他。

lineList.en: Buy the truth, and sell it not; also wisdom, and instruction, and understanding.
lineList.cn: 你当买真理。就是智慧，训诲，和聪明，也都不可卖。

lineList.en: The father of the righteous shall greatly rejoice: and he that begetteth a wise child shall have joy of him.
lineList.cn: 义人的父亲，必大得快乐。人生智慧的儿子，必因他欢喜。

lineList.en: Thy father and thy mother shall be glad, and she that bare thee shall rejoice.
lineList.cn: 你要使父母欢喜。使生你的快乐。

lineList.en: My son, give me thine heart, and let thine eyes observe my ways.
lineList.cn: 我儿，要将你的心归我。你的眼目，也要喜悦我的道路。

lineList.en: For a whore is a deep ditch; and a strange woman is a narrow pit.
lineList.cn: 妓女是深坑。外女是窄阱。

lineList.en: She also lieth in wait as for a prey, and increaseth the transgressors among men.
lineList.cn: 他埋伏好像强盗，他使人中多有奸诈的。

lineList.en: Who hath woe? who hath sorrow? who hath contentions? who hath babbling? who hath wounds without cause? who hath redness of eyes?
lineList.cn: 谁有祸患，谁有忧愁，谁有争斗，谁有哀叹，（或作怨言）谁无故受伤，谁眼目红赤。

lineList.en: They that tarry long at the wine; they that go to seek mixed wine.
lineList.cn: 就是那流连饮酒，常去寻梢调和酒的人。

lineList.en: Look not thou upon the wine when it is red, when it giveth his colour in the cup, when it moveth itself aright.
lineList.cn: 酒发红，在杯中闪烁，你不可观看，虽然下咽舒畅，终久是咬你如蛇，刺你如毒蛇。

lineList.en: At the last it biteth like a serpent, and stingeth like an adder.
Thine eyes shall behold strange women, and thine heart shall utter perverse things.
lineList.cn: 你眼必看见异怪的事。（异怪的事或作淫妇）你心必发出乖谬的话。

lineList.en: Yea, thou shalt be as he that lieth down in the midst of the sea, or as he that lieth upon the top of a mast.
lineList.cn: 你必像躺在海中，或像卧在桅杆上。

lineList.en: They have stricken me, shalt thou say, and I was not sick; they have beaten me, and I felt it not: when shall I awake? I will seek it yet again.
lineList.cn: 你必说，人打我，我却未受伤，人鞭打我，我竟不觉得，我几时清醒，我仍去寻酒。
